Back to George Frideric Handel

George Frideric Handel

Sonata con trio e gavotta in C major, HWV 578

c. 1750

[IMSLP]

Total duration: 6' 30"

  • 1. Sonata: Allegro
  • 2. Trio: Larghetto
  • 3. Gavotte: Non troppo presto

Handel originally wrote these movements for musical clock. He later made minor changes, presumably to create a version suited for the harpsichord.

Recommended editions

  • Hallische Händel-Ausgabe (Bärenreiter) · IV/6 · BA 4028 · Klavierwerke III / Einzelne Suiten und Stücke, Erste Folge · ed. Terence Best
  • Bärenreiter · BA 4222 · Klavierwerke III / Einzelne Suiten und Stücke, Erste Folge · ed. Terence Best

1. Sonata: Allegro

A version of the movement is also used in the Halleluja in F major (HWV 277).

Duration: 3'

Difficulty: 2.5

2. Trio: Larghetto

An alternative version of the movement is the air in G minor (HWV 467).

Duration: 2' 30"

Difficulty: 2.5

3. Gavotte: Non troppo presto

A version of the movement is also used in the concerto grosso in C major (HWV 318).

Duration: 1'

Difficulty: 2
